name: Manticore
description: Insectoid-feline creatures with a mastery over poisons. Immune to poison and wither, but with lower HP. Spines deal damage to attackers but only while Manticore is above 50% HP. Bug-like mobs won’t attack, and unarmed strikes inflict poison. Pickaxe-like paws and natural thorns make them dangerous in close combat. Night vision ensures they see in the dark, but they’re vulnerable to Bane of Arthropods. An obligate carnivore with a venomous bite.

upgrades.announcement: By entering the end portal, you have steeled your resolve.
